targets.expr: sum(billing_contract_manager_total_edm_contracts{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*"} / billing_contract_manager_total_contracts{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*"}) / count by (app) (billing_contract_manager_total_edm_contracts{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*"} / billing_contract_manager_total_contracts{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*"})

panels.title: Share of EDM contracts

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"cost-center-manager.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-contract-manager.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-commission-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-commission-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))

sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"as-sp-commission-manager.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0
